channel.title: Tier IV on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tier IV on Home

item.title: Tier IV stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier IV during update 6.0. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.0. On average, players played 18 battles.

item.title: Tier IV Tanks
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows the tanks with the highest Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: A-20
item.description: A-20 is a Soviet Tier IV Light Tank. Player Population This graphs compare’s the tank’s player population by WR at Tier to other same tier Light Tanks. Relative WR vs. Player Skill-level This graphs shows how well players of different skill-level (measured by WR at Tier) perform in the tank vs.
